missionProperties.missionDescription:
VICTORY! With the destruction of the Death Star, the Rebellion has given hope to a galaxy living in fear. Having los their ultimate weapon, the Empire scrambles to recover in the face of this crushing defeat.

As the scattered fragments of the battle station rain down upon the Rebel base on Yavin 4, the Empire sets in motion a plan to seek retribution against Rebel forces stationed on the small moon.

Not long after, when an Imperial beacon begins to broadcast from an outpost some distance away from the Rebel base, a small team of elite operatives is dispatched; their mission: to silence the signal at all costs.
missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: 4, Defense: 1 {G}). Apply +1 {G} to the terminal's defense results if it is adjacent to 1 or more Imperial figures.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The Rebels win when all terminals are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
Arriving at the outpost, you immediately open fire upon the troops standing guard. You suspect they knew you were coming and that you're likely walking into an ambush. All the same, with the signal continuing to broadcast, there just isn't time for a more subtle approach.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: 4, Defense: 1 {G}). Apply +1 {G} to the terminal's defense results if it is adjacent to 1 or more Imperial figures.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The Rebels win when all terminals are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Fortified
globalEvents.eventText:
"They're here!" the Imperial forces shout as they scramble their defenses. "Keep them away from the transmitters!"

There's a crackle from your comlink. "Imperial forces on approach!" your pilot contacts you from your transport, now circling overhead. "The place is going to be crawling with them soon, so get the Job done quick!"

entityProperties.name: Outpost Door 1
entityProperties.theText: A door leads into the Imperial outpost

globalEvents.name: Lockdown - Selection
globalEvents.eventText: Shortly after you invade the outposts, Imperial security protocols activate.

eventActions.theText: Are there two or more Rebel figures outside the outpost?

globalEvents.name: Lockdown - option 1
globalEvents.eventText:
With a loud hum, energy shields activate around the remaining terminals.

Each terminal has 7 Health instead of 4.

eventActions.theText:
{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: 7, Defense: 1 {G}). Apply +1 {G} to the terminal's defense results if it is adjacent to 1 or more Imperial figures.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The Rebels win when all terminals are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Lockdown - option 2
globalEvents.eventText:
The door slams shut again.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: 8, Defense: 1 black  die).

entityProperties.name: Outpost Door 1
entityProperties.theText:
The door is locked tight.

A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: 8, Defense: 1 black die).

eventActions.theText:
{-} A Rebel figure can attack a terminal (Health: 4, Defense: 1 {G}). Apply +1 {G} to the terminal's defense results if it is adjacent to 1 or more Imperial figures.
{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: 8, Defense: 1 black  die).
{-} The Rebels win when all terminals are destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
Their plans disrupted, the remaining Imperial forces fall into a hasty retreat. "Nice work!" Your pilot grins back at you as you pile into the transport.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Place Story Mission card "A New Threat" into play.
{-} Each player receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Imperial soldiers pour ot of the forest on all sides; the beacon has done its job, and you have to run. With so many of the Imperial survivors getting organized, Rebel ground troops are going to have their hands full.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Place Story Mission card "Under Siege" into play.
{-} Each player receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Terminal 1 destroyed
globalEvents.eventText: The terminal explodes in a shower of sparks. The hum of the broadcast stops immediately.

entityProperties.name: Terminal1
entityProperties.theText:
